original_text: I did not go up to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before I was, but I went into Arabia. Later I returned to Damascus.
korean_text: 또 나보다 먼저 사도 된 자들을 만나려고 예루살렘으로 가지 아니하고 아라비아로 갔다가 다시 다메섹으로 돌아갔노라

sentences.original_text: I did not go up to Jerusalem
to see those who were apostles before I was
sentences.korean_translation: 나보다 먼저 사도였던 사람들을 만나려 한 것이 아니라
